title: Australia v England: Head blasts hosts to eight-wicket Ashes win in first Test inside two days – live
summary: In the series opener in Perth, the hosts successfully chased down a target of 205 runs to secure victory. This win sets a positive tone for the series ahead. Join our writers for further reactions and analysis.

title: Premier League buildup, Barcelona return to Camp Nou and more – matchday live
summary: Today's coverage includes news, discussions, and previews focused on the upcoming major football matches. Fans can expect insights and analysis ahead of the games. Stay tuned for highlights and key updates throughout the day.

title: Travis Head powers Australia to humbling Ashes Test win over England inside two days
summary: Travis Head scored a dominant 123 runs, leading Australia to a successful chase of 205 runs. With this performance, Australia secured victory over England in the first Ashes Test. The win came with eight wickets in hand.

title: Ukraine’s allies to meet at G20 summit after Zelenskyy warns of ‘impossible choice’ over Trump plan to end war – live
summary: Donald Trump has proposed a peace plan for Ukraine that requires the country to cede territory to Russia and make significant concessions. The plan seeks to resolve the ongoing conflict but has faced criticism for undermining Ukraine's sovereignty. Trump's stance highlights ongoing debates about how to achieve lasting peace in the region.

title: ‘I have never felt so popular!’: can I change my look – and my life – with a clip-on fringe?
summary: The trending hairstyle is 'The Claudia,' popularized by presenter Claudia Winkleman. However, not everyone has her thick hair, leading to a surge in fake fringes. The author shares their personal experience trying one out.
